Verses: 1 dhevasabaiyile Dhevan Ezhundharuliyirukkiraar; Dhevargalin Naduvile Avar Niyaayam Visaarikkiraar.
2 edhuvaraikkum Neengal Aniyaayaththeerppuchseydhu, Thunmaarkkarukku Mugadhaatchiniyam Pannuveergal. (selaa.)
3 ezhaikkum Thikkatra Pillaikkum Niyaayanseydhu, Sirumaippattavanukkum Thikkatravanukkum Needhi Seyyungal.
4 balaveenanaiyum Eliyavanaiyum Viduviththu, Dhunmaarkkarin Kaikku Avargalaith Thappuviyungal.
5 ariyaamalum Unaraamalum Irukkiraargal, Andhagaaraththile Nadakkiraargal; Thesaththin Asthibaarangalellaam Asaigiradhu.
6 neengal Dhevargal Endrum, Neengalellaarum Unnadhamaanavarin Makkal Endrum Naan Solliyirundhen.
7 aanaalum Neengal Manusharaippolach Seththu, Logappirabukkalil Oruvanaippola Vizhundhupoveergal.
8 dhevane, Ezhundharulum, Boomikku Niyaayaththeerppuch Seyyum; Neere Sagala Jaadhigalaiyum Sudhandharamaagak Kondiruppavar.
